content: Flip the script on your favorite villains by tearing them to pieces – literally – with the horror icon jigsaw puzzles. Once completed, each puzzle displays a stunningly horrific portrait of each villain that any horror movie buff would love.

Start your incredible journey off on the right foot by exchanging vows using the Millennium Falcon ring. These geeky wedding bands come in a variety of equally opulent finishes that any Star Wars fan will absolutely love.

It’s about time you added some character to your home’s decor using the Doctor Who electrical outlet sticker. These removable vinyl matte decal anthropomorphizes your electrical outlets into tiny versions of our favorite Time Lord.

Spice up your outfit by toting around your personal items in the taco purse. Modeled after a crunchy hard shell taco, this hand made compact purse comes with all your favorite fixings and is topped off with a heaping helping of shredded cheese.

All the way from the awesome ’80s, those devious Gremlins are back and are now yours to own! For lovers of cheesy ’80s flicks, the life sized Gremlins are a dream come true. Each Gremlin is masterfully sculpted to recreate the monstrous little guys.

The King might sit on the Iron Throne, but the Queen can look even more fabulous by wearing the Iron Throne shoes! These heels come cleverly decked out with dozens of tiny plastic food pick swords spray painted to resemble the Iron Throne, in shoe form.

Instill fear in your fellow gamers with a roll of the dragon dice. These customized dice come decorated with an intricate dragon design painted skillfully to make the dragon practically come to life with every single roll.

Make a bold statement in your humble abode with the porcupine quill mirror. A bona fide conversation piece, this handmade mirror boasts a stunning porcupine quill design running a sharp course around the entire frame.

Rest your weary body like a true Pokemon master after you swap out your bed for the Snorlax bed. Better than any king size bed on the market, this handmade Snorlax bed utilizes the superfluous blubber to provide a cozy sleeping spot.

Relive your greatest childhood gaming adventures as you shower with the Nintendo 64 cartridge soap. Each bar of soap is shaped like a life size replica of the most famous N64 cartridges we all spent a good chunk of our adolescent life devoted to.

Enjoy the company of the Pumpkin King himself as you chow down your breakfast with the Jack Skellington cereal bowl. Breakfast will be that much more enjoyable for fans of the classic Tim Burton flick when they’re eating out of Jack Skellington’s skull.

Relive your favorite episodes of the hit 90s show with the Friends apartment paper diorama. This handmade gem perfectly captures Monica’s iconic apartment right down to her yellow cleaning gloves and Phoebe’s dollhouse – could this BE anymore awesome?!

Upgrade your puny human body and become the hero you’ve always dreamed with the Iron Man Arc Reactor. This handmade replica is made with such craftsmanship that it’s sure to be the crown jewel in your vast collection of Marvel memorabilia.

Hey girl, looking for the perfect pair of panties? Introducing Ryan Gosling’s face panties. Made out of boyfriend material, it’s the closest you’ll get to sitting on Ryan Gosling’s perfectly formed face. It’s one pair of panties that won’t be dropping anytime soon.

Unleash your inner Jedi and fight off the Dark Side with the Star Wars lightsaber replica in your capable hands. Made from a resilient aircraft grade aluminum, this handmade item is the closest you’ll get to ever owning a real lightsaber.

Bring honor to your family by having the best dressed doggy on the block with the samurai dog costume. This hand made leather custom makes your canine friend look like a feared and respected samurai that all other pets will bow down to while he sniffs their asses.

Look dapper in the classroom with this utterly nostalgic composition notebook tie. The composition notebook’s globally recognizable two tone design makes it the perfect gift for a teacher, principal, or unnoticed genius janitor with a troubled past.

Melt faces off in less than 12 parsecs when you commandeer the Millennium Falcon bass guitar. Upon seeing you take to the stage with an illuminated Millennium Falcon, all the intergalactic groupies will be fighting over you instead of the lead singer.

Decorate your home with a true treasure from the sea – the glass octopus. Hand crafted from glass and borosilicate, this stunning creation come draped in vibrant and creative styles ideal for complimenting any plain home decor.

Be the envy of all Westeros when you adorn this beautiful purple wedding style necklace. This surprisingly potent jewelry was crafted in the likeness of the piece worn by Sansa Stark – and it’s definitely to die for!

Let the easy day/rough day wine glass help take the edge off with the perfect dosage of wine. Thanks to the wine glass’s clever design, you’ll always know the exact amount of wine needed to relax you after a long and hectic day.

Show your geeky significant other that you want them as your life long co-pilot with the Star Wars X-Wing ring. This masterfully crafted ring combines black and white diamonds along with rubies to create an elegant piece of jewelry that any Rebel scum would love.

Blast your hunger into oblivion with delectable Mega Man cookies made from this specialized cutter. The Mega Man cookie cutter comes shaped like an 8-bit outline of your favorite blue robot character that you can decorate as far as your artistic skills take you.

Make poker nights more cunning by playing with the Game of Thrones playing cards. This custom designed deck is a real treat for all fans of the show. Each suit represents a different house while the cards display your favorite characters in amazing detail.

Keep up with Joneses by transforming your home into a classic Mario level with the Super Mario Bros flag. The flag bears the iconic shape and design of the iconic 8-bit flags at the end of each level and makes an ideal gift for any gamer.

Become a member of the deceased with this line of custom “Living Dead” full body costumes. This full outfit is ripe with detail, offering multiple bloodstain shades and rotting ripped clothes that will bring any Halloween or zombie themed costume party “to life”.

Take a small piece of your favorite Disney flick wherever you go with the Up movie balloon necklace. This small pendant is shaped like the iconic Up house and includes a plethora of brightly colored balloons to help your outfit pop with color.

As the old saying goes, “if you liked it you should have put a giant cathedral ring on it”. More than just a ring, it’s wearable art – a sculpture for the hand that sticks out 50mm in the air as it displays the ominous structure of darkness.

Become the coolest kid in junior high school when you show up to class rocking the calculator boobs necklace. This sterling silver necklace sports a “80085” pendant paying homage to the legendary calculator technique we all did as young whippersnappers.

Tie the knot in overwhelming geeky fashion with this Star Wars inspired Tie Fighter ring. This stunning custom made ring is forged from your choice of gold, silver, or platinum, and is accented by the a jaw-dropping one karat black diamond in the center.

These are the <del>droids</del> cupcakes you are looking for! With the R2-D2 cupcake topper  you can take your baked goods to new levels of geeky deliciousness, as the cupcake toppers transform your treats into tiny, edible R2-D2 droid cupcakes.

Now you can customize your gaming gear with the Xbox 360 9mm bullet buttons to reflect your lethal skills. This deadly mod allows you to replace the standard multicolored buttons with  handmade buttons that replicate the ends of 9mm bullets.

titleEN: No Cocaine In The Bathroom Stitch
content: Keep guests from acting out their favorite Scarface scenes in your home with the “no cocaine in the bathroom” stitch. Following the stitch pattern results in a fun and quaint way to warn those shady house guests to refrain from certain illegal activities.

titleEN: Nicolas Cage Mona Lisa iPhone Case
content: Protect your hip new iPhone with an iconic art piece re-mastered to include the one true god, Nicolas Cage. This holy grail of iPhone add-on technology features a hard impact-resistant body that will last you longer than Nic Cage’s spotless movie career.

When traditional spectacles just won’t suffice, take a cue from Ichabod Crane with the steampunk Sleepy Hollow goggles. This distinguished pair of goggles comes equipped with more lenses than you’ll know what do to with, and are excellent for cosplaying.

It’s an indispensable part of life, and now with the toilet paper necklace it’ll also be an indispensable fashion accessory. This cute necklace comes with a small beaded toilet paper roll hanging from a lovely chain – rolled over from the top, as it should be.

Scare intruders off your land with the “Trespassers Will Be Eaten By Zombies” sign displayed prominently on your property. Anyone even thinking about going near your abode will go running back the way they came to avoid becoming a zombie happy meal.

The beef jerky underwear is proof that dreams really do come true. These tasty and protein-packed panties take edible underwear to the next level – not only by looking and feeling great, but also by providing your lucky partner with their recommended daily carb intake.

titleEN: Glow In The Dark Chandelier Decal
content: Place a touch of surrealism to any room in the home with the glow in the dark chandelier decal. The decal depicts an extravagant chandelier you can stick virtually anywhere you want and enjoy the magical ambient lighting it provides once fully charged.

Before you head out into the streets to fight crime or hit on nubile news reporters, make sure you’re bundled up with the Ninja Turtle hats. Each hand-knit yarn beanie turns the top of your noggin into your favorite hero in a half shell complete the signature colors.

As the old saying goes, one superhero’s waste is another fan boy’s prized possession. And now thanks to superhero poop webstore you’ll be able to complete your geeky collection by owning a small piece of your favorite comic book superhero.

Say no to uninvited apparitions in your home with the Ghostbusters coffee table. This geeky custom made table will tie together your living room while serving a double purpose of sending a clear message that ghosts will be busted in your home.

It’s a jungle out there, even in your own backyard. The hippopotamus lawn ornament is the fun way to transform your dull yard into a more wild and exciting place to be. It measures 22″ long and is made from concrete which makes it ideal for outdoor use.

Witness the Lord of the North of Grassteros in all his glory. He sits on the Throne of a Thousand Shovels in King’s Lawnding. The gnome realm is in disarray and there are rumors of gnome zombies from Cannibal Rock. Prepare yourselves, summer is coming.

The rainbow wig is the fun and vibrant hair accessory that’ll fit virtually any outfit your wear. From formal to casual to Halloween costumes, no matter what color scheme you decide to go with, you’ll find a color to match on the rainbow wig.

titleEN: Glow In The Dark Elvish Dog Collar
content: Get your unruly dog under control with the one collar to rule them all – the glow in the dark elvish dog collar. This geektastic dog collar is made from vegetable tanned leather and comes with the iconic elvish inscription engraved into it that also glows in the dark.

Who needs coffee in the morning when you can scare yourself awake? These grotesquely designed mugs – hideous as they may look – are made with a stunning level of artistry for a one of a kind mug no one else will mistake for their own at the office.

Save important documents in true Victorian fashion with the steampunk glowing USB drive. This 16 gig drive is designed with a distinctive steampunk body and features an embedded crystal that glows bright blue when transferring your data.

Take a part of your beloved spouse wherever you go with the fingerprint wedding band. Forged of beautiful white gold, this unique wedding band comes engraved with your significant other’s fingerprint so that no matter where life takes you, they’ll always be with you.

Transform your wine collection into a creative alcohol filled prehistoric display with the Stegosaurus wine rack. The creative design of the wine rack makes each bottle look like an amusing wooden Stegosaurus you can always count on to get you drunk.

Make your young adventurer’s off-road dreams come true with the Jeep Wrangler bed template. The template provides step-by-step instructions so you – or someone who’s actually handy – can craft the ultimate action bed for your adventurous offspring.

Relive the excitement and glory of old school gaming every time you utilize the Super Mario Bros mouse pad. Your mouse will glide with ease over the smooth and spacious pad styled with a classic Super Mario Bros design that is perfect for old school gamers.

Share a sacred bond with your BFF by partaking in the lifelong ritual of wearing the milk and cookies necklaces. No matter where life may take you two, as long as you both have your necklaces, you’ll be as inseparable as this classic combination.

Wear your favorite games with the Super NES cartridge ring. These nostalgic handmade gems can be completely customized to resemble your favorite Super Nintendo title and look great with any outfit – making them the ultimate retro gamer fashion accessory.

Enjoy a soft and colorful cotton candy roll without the sticky mess or unwanted calories with the cotton candy necklace. This carnival styled handmade gem features a small and colorful roll of freshly spun cotton candy that’s great for complementing any look.

Bring the Shire into your humble abode with the Lord Of The Rings Hobbit terrarium. This lovely handmade item is small enough to fit just about anywhere and gives LOTR fans a chance to gaze at the picturesque environment of our favorite Hobbits.

The chalkboard flask gives you the perfect excuse to take your hooch anywhere you go. When people question why you have a flask at the supermarket, just flash them the flask and they’ll see your shopping list jotted down – and an impromptu intervention is averted.

Becoming Dovahkiin is as easy as slipping on the crochet viking helmet. This custom made piece of apparel disguises your mere mortal self with a mighty dragonborn helmet that will also keep you warm during the merciless winter nights.

Part masterpiece, part collectible, and all around awesome – the Judge Dredd stained glass lamp is the must have accessory for any fan of the Judge. This beautifully crafted lamp illuminates the designated area while accenting the room’s decorum.

Create an eye catching look by accenting your outfit with the octopus tentacle earrings. These zany and colorful earrings are designed to look like realistic – albeit interestingly colored – octopus tentacles guaranteed to get you noticed whenever you wear them.

Stay warm by dressing up as one of Gotham’s most deranged citizens with the Harley Quinn hoodie. The hoodie is made of soft cotton accented by thick white yarn and is designed after Harley Quinn’s signature harlequin jester outfit.

One flick of the superhero <del>penis</del> light switch plate and PLOW! – your entire bedroom lights up. With these comic book styled light switch plates you’ll be able to choose your favorite superhero <del>to molest</del> to accompany you through the light and dark times.

Get up off the couch and explore new places with the Adventure Time Jake neck pillow. Jake’s taking a break from hanging with Finn and has now become your ultimate travel companion, lending his magical form shifting abilities for your comfort.

Accent your outfit like the great warriors of the East with the katana sword earrings. Forged from silver, these handmade earrings were inspired by Michonne’s badass zombie slaying katana and can be customized in size and hue to match any style.

Get your young padawan into Star Wars from a young age by building one of these geektastic Star Wars AT-AT rocker using this template. The template provides you with a step by step guide that shows you everything you need to know to make your own.

Boldly go where no geeky piece of jewelry has gone before with this stylish Starship Enterprise necklace. It’s designed in the likeness of the iconic ship from Star Trek and comes in either a rodium gold or sterling silver version decorated with diamonds.

A long time ago in a groovy galaxy far, far away – the Imperials completed construction of their far out Death Star disco ball. This unique Star Wars collectible combines groovy with geeky so you can dance the night away under the psychedelic lighting of the Death Star.

Pleasure your prostate in the most politically active way possible with the 3D printed Putin butt plug. Using the Putin butt plug you and your fellow comrades will be able to make a bold rebellious statement against Putin’s conservative views.

Get ready to roll out from the darkness of the night – into the light upon flipping the Optimus Prime stained glass lamp on. This beautifully crafted Transformers lamp captures the mighty leader of the Autobots, Optimus Prime in all his glory.

Take your love of tools and hardware into the intellectual realm by playing a game with the classic tool chess set. This handmade set contains 32 well crafted pieces made out of everyday hardware, and are power coated to give them a truly elegant finish.

Accent your heroic look with a little bit of gamer flair straight out of Hyrule with the Hylian shield earrings. These custom made earrings bear the iconic shield emblem of the Triforce along with the archaic red bird drawn below it to complete the iconic look.

Organize your personal manifestos and other literary masterpieces in true Gotham fashion with the Batman Arkham Asylum bookshelf. Each handmade bookshelf boasts a sturdy aluminum frame that forms a giant bat signal when brought together.

The Dark side has never looked as fashionable as it does with the Darth Vader ring. Not even the Dark Lord’s flowing black robes can match the beauty and craftsmanship of this hand made sterling silver ring. It’s a perfect fit for any Star Wars fan.

Unleash your smartphone’s inner beast when you set it atop the battle robot cellphone holder. This custom-made cellphone holder keeps your SkyNet ready smartphone in the upright position so it’s safe from falling over while it violently asserts its dominance.

Commit to your loved one for better or worse, in sickness and health, through space and time with the Doctor Who spinning TARDIS ring – till the end of regeneration cycles do you part. It comes in various finishes and is available in men’s and women’s sizes.

Soar as high as Apollo’s chariot wheel with the steampunk Icarus wings on your back. These steampunk styled wings are custom made from reclaimed salvaged Arbutus and are fully articulated so they can be extended at a moments notice with the pull of a handle.

Let your inner astronomer shine through in the kitchen when you prepare your meals with the solar system cutting board. This bamboo cutting board comes engraved with all of our solar system planets and provides ample space for prepping ingredients.

Harness the power of the dark side to properly clean the dirty side of your body when you scrub with the Death Star soap bar. This intricately decorated designer soap smells like a springtime meadow and obliterates germs like the planet of Alderaan.

Set phasers to engagement and boldly go where no ring has gone before with this Star Trek inspired Starship Enterprise ring. Available in various sizes and finishes, the Starship Enterprise ring is the ultimate marital ring for the Captain of your heart.

titleEN: Glow In The Dark Light Bulb Sticker
content: Need a bright idea? Try hanging the glow in the dark light bulb sticker in the bedroom of your scaredy-cat offspring. The sticker is designed like an over-sized light bulb that emits a soothing greenish glow and is available in various sizes to best suit your needs.

Regardless of whether you’ve pledged your undying allegiance to the Horde or the Alliance, these handmade World of Warcraft inspired clay hearthstone earrings make an excellent wearable fashion accessory while you and your guildmates go raiding.

Charge into <del>battle</del> bedtime with a true leader by your side when you place the Halo Master Chief stained glass lamp on your nightstand. Handcrafted using the Tiffany Glass Technique, this unique stained glass lamp is a must have home lighting accessory for gamers.

Cement your bromance in true superhero fashion with the Batman and Robin BFF necklace. You and the other half of your crime fighting dynamic duo both keep a small pendant piece that when combined form an iconic bat symbol.

The Dude must abide when an opportunity to buy such a room-tying-together rug presents itself. This cult classic rug was crafted using nineteen colors of acrylic, and will be the greatest piece of home decor you’ll ever own – but well, that’s just like, uh, our opinion, man.

Increase your hipster level ten-fold when you plug in the steampunk keyboard to your computer. This beautifully made custom keyboard employs a vintage style that features a quality wooden base complemented by a genuine leather surface.

Beware when you shower for Nosferatu is never far way. The Nosferatu shower curtain is the handmade item made for cinema buffs and horror movie freaks – the curtain keeps your bathroom nice and dry while an ominous Nosferatu shaped shadow lurks about.

Sprinkle on a few pinches of darkness and punk rock to your outfit with the Misfits skull belt buckle. The buckle is handcrafted in the darkest pits of hell in the shape of the Misfits skull logo for all members of the Fiend club to wear proudly.

Turn your body into the new vessel for the mighty Krang with the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles Krang belt buckle. This over-sized handmade buckle is so amazingly detailed you’ll expect Krang to come alive and start ordering you around at any second.

Get toasted apocalypse style with the zombie hand pipe. This hand blown glass pipe features a high quality and unique zombie hand design – complete with decrepit fingers and multicolored rotting flesh that are sure to have make your lungs drool once you lay your eyes on it.

Fancy up your formal wear with the wooden lapel flower. This distinguished lapel flower is made from high quality rosewood and is complemented by a lovely heather grey centerpiece that will truly accentuate any classic look.

Offset your bathroom’s girly decor with the bold look of the industrial pipe toilet paper holder. The toilet paper features a decorative red spigot you can rotate to entertain yourself while you unload some industrial size chocolate bombs in your toilet.

As far as mash-ups go, you’d be hard pressed to find an item more cleverly geeky than the pokeball Death Star shirt. The shirt’s epic design depicts an enormous pokeball shaped Death Star floating in the merciless darkness of outer space.

Achieve <del>immortality</del> eternal cleanliness when you summon the mighty Shenron with the Dragon Ball Z soap. Each handmade soap will have you feeling springtime fresh in no time at all – collect all 7 and the eternal dragon will appear to grant you a wish!

Frighten your beloved by showing them love and affection with the “Miss You” card. This mildly-murderous yet tender and thoughtful card helps your violent little heart express just how much you think about your sweetie on a daily basis – even while at the shooting range.

Expand your mind the same way Jake expands and stretches every part of his body with the Adventure Time Jake glass pipe. This custom made pipe is a true work of art – it stands at 5 inches and resembles the fearless warrior right down to his big googly eyes.

Let your romantic personality shine through – your face piercings – with the heart nose stud. This lovely stud is handcrafted from sterling silver in the shape of a small heart, whose simple and classic design combine perfectly with any look.

Decorate your young prince’s bedroom like something out of the Seven Kingdoms with the medieval castle Murphy bed. The Murphy bed comes intricately decorated to resemble a grand medieval castle, which can fold up when not in use by its royal subject.

Choose to get clean like a true champion when you shower with the Pokeball soap. This custom made soap is absolutely delightful – once you’re left feeling clean and fresh, the Pokeball soap rewards you for staying clean with an actual Pokemon inside of the ball!

Watch as Walt battles his demons by facing off against his alter ego – Heisenberg – with the Breaking Bad chess set. This custom built chess set pits Walt, Skylar, and Walt Jr. against Heisenberg and his sinister henchmen all hell bent on destroying each other.

The NES controller ring is just what you need to infuse a bit of geeky style into your ordinary look. This silver ring comes adorned with a miniature replica of the classic NES controller – expertly crafted right down to the smallest detail for maximum authenticity.
